name: Waywo Bot
description: Slackbot to share what individuals are working on across an organisation

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Slack bot token associated with a bot installed on a workspace.

SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Slack signing secret used to check authenticity of requests.

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Slack channel that the bot is a member of.

SCHEDULE.description: Cron schedule to select a user at random. Defaults to Mon-Fri, 9am.

TIMEZONE.description: Timezone to execute cron schedule. Defaults to Europe/London.
